meanings.definition: A small device used for viewing or editing film footage.
meanings.sent1: I used the movieola to watch the film I made.
meanings.sent2: The filmmaker used the movieola to edit the scenes.
meanings.sent3: The movieola sat on the desk, ready to bring the film to life.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the movieola, shaping the story.
meanings.sent5: The movieola hummed softly as it played the film.

meanings.definition: A type of film editing machine.
meanings.sent1: The movieola helped in cutting and splicing the film.
meanings.sent2: The old movieola was still functional after all these years.
meanings.sent3: The movieola seemed to have a mind of its own, making editing fun.
meanings.sent4: The movieola was a magician, turning raw footage into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle whir, the movieola brought the film together.

meanings.definition: A brand name for a type of film editing equipment.
meanings.sent1: The movieola brand is known for its quality in the industry.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using the movieola for its user-friendly interface.
meanings.sent3: The movieola logo gleamed proudly on the equipment.
meanings.sent4: In the world of film editing, movieola reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The movieola machine purred as it worked its editing magic.
